edu.mines.jtk.sgl

Class TransformGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.mines.jtk.sgl.Node
      • edu.mines.jtk.sgl.Group
        • edu.mines.jtk.sgl.TransformGroup

  • public class TransformGroup
extends Group
    A group node that transforms the coordinates for its children.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TransformGroup(Matrix44 transform)
      Constructs a new transform group with specified transform.

      • computeBoundingSphere

        protected BoundingSphere computeBoundingSphere(boolean finite)
        Computes the bounding sphere for this transform group. A transform group computes its bounding sphere in its untransformed coordinate system, not the transformed system of its children.
        Overrides:
        computeBoundingSphere in class Group
        Parameters:
        finite - true, to force bounding sphere to be finite.
        Returns:
        the computed bounding sphere.
